summary.name: Pave Diamond Band Ring in 14k White  or Yellow Gold (1/2 ct. t.w.)
summary.description: A sparkling wedding band provides the perfect complement. Crafted in 14k white gold, ring features pave-set, round-cut diamonds (1/2 ct. t.w.).
